extensionDescription.message: Blocks specific sites from appearing in Google search results

blacklist.message: Sites blocked from appearing in Google search results

blacklistDescription.message: You can use match patterns or regular expressions

importDescription.message: Paste a domain list exported from Personal Blocklist

syncDescription.message: This feature creates a file named uBlacklist.txt on your Google Drive, and synchronizes it with your local settings

googleDriveDescription.message: You need to sign in to your Google Account, and permit this extension to access your Google Drive

googleApisDescription.message: You need to permit this extension to access Google APIs (www.googleapis.com)
